sense.def:
Kadar žival, na primer konj,
trots
, se hitro premika in pri tem dviga noge precej visoko od tal.

seg.quote: He made the beast turn aside and trot away.
She urged her pony into an energetic trot.

sense.def:
To trot somewhere
pomeni iti nekam precej hitro in z drobnimi koraki.

seg.quote: Try not to miss two lessons on the trot.

sense.def:
To trot out old ideas or pieces of information
pomeni ponavljati stare ideje ali podatke na dolgočasen način.

seg.quote: They trot out all the old reasons for their failure.
